original_text: Also, nobody wants to drink new wine after he has drunk old wine. He will say, “The old wine is much better.” ’
korean_text: 묵은 포도주를 마시고 새 것을 원하는 자가 없나니 이는 묵은 것이 좋다 함이니라

sentences.original_text: Also, nobody wants to drink new wine
sentences.korean_translation: 또한, 아무도 새 포도주를 마시고 싶어하지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: after he has drunk old wine
The old wine is much better
